metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19960 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In wolfSSL before 4.3.0, wc_ecc_mulmod_ex does not properly resist side-channel attacks.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-19960` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl24 - 4.3.0+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.0+dfsg-2').
